img_above_text:
# Jade Fang
Jade Fang is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
The Jade Fang can be used to craft the Twin Serpents Staff from the Shrine.

img_summary: The image depicts the inventory screen from the game Black Myth: Wukong, specifically highlighting the Jade Fang item. The Jade Fang is an uncommon special crafting material used to create weapons and armor, such as the Twin Serpents Staff from the Shrine. The item description notes that the fang was obtained from the Whiteclad Noble, who has paid his blood debt. The image serves to illustrate the in-game appearance and details of the Jade Fang within the player's inventory.
